title: Memories and portraits,
author: Stevenson, Robert Louis
snippet: Another old theologian, Brown of Wamphray, was often in his hands.

title: Spare hours.
author: Brown, John
snippet: Calderwood, Robert Bailie, Cowper, the Bishop of Galloway, Hugh Binning, Rutherford, Guthrie of Fenwick, Durham, Dickson, Brown of Wamphray, the authors of " Naphtali " and the " Hind let Loose," with Leighton, Henry Scougal, and many others, all published more or less extensively.
